# Polar / Verso

A new [software](https://github.com/GermanoGallicchio/Polar) with traditional and novel indices for the analysis of oscillatory coupling. Combining:

- circular statistics
- unbiased estimators
- harmonic analysis
- linear algebra
- resampling statistics

[In progress/upcoming:]{.fragment}

- Algorithm development
- Application to physiological data
